ref: 1909 *ut -- spandati ʻ jumps up ʼ. 2. Caus. *ut -- spandayati. [√spand]
Kho. (Lor.) ušpunik, iš˚ ʻ to dance about, buck (of a horse) ʼ; (Morgenstierne) iš˚ ʻ to hop, dance ʼ (doubtful bec. of š, not ṣ: poss. < spandatē, but if so why not is -- ? Perh. ←
A. ophandiba ʻ to be puffed up, be proud ʼ.
